text: Roy Greenwood (born 26 September 1952) is an English former professional footballer who played as a winger in the Football League for Hull City, Sunderland, Derby County, Swindon Town, Huddersfield Town and Tranmere Rovers in the 1970s and 1980s. ==References== ==External links== * League stats at Neil Brown's site Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Leeds Category:English footballers Category:Association football wingers Category:Hull City A.F.C. players Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Derby County F.C. players Category:Swindon Town F.C. players Category:Huddersfield Town A.F.C. players Category:Tranmere Rovers F.C. players Category:Scarborough F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Roy Greenwood (footballer, born 1952)
